label: Calories
desc: approximate calories consumed on that date. Calorie counts were taken for each food based on nutritional information and rounded up to the nearest 50 to facilitate easy record keeping. Where nutritional information was not available, calorie counts were estimated from previous experience and best guesses of ingredients and comparison to meals with available nutritional information.

label: Cal/oz
desc: calories per ounce - calories for that day divided by weight in ounces

label: Donut Day
desc: day where main meal was bag of five jam donuts, 1 = TRUE, 0 = FALSE

label: Brisk Walk
desc: day included at least one brisk walk of over 20 minutes, 1 = TRUE, 0 = FALSE

label: Short Run
desc: day included at one short run of 2.5 miles, 1 = TRUE, 0 = FALSE

label: Wine Night
desc: day finished with at least one large glass of wine when not accompanied by other fluids, 1 = TRUE, 0 = FALSE

label: High Protein
desc: day involved what would be considered a high protein diet, 1 = TRUE, 0 = FALSE

label: Exercise Period
desc: signifies day during period of weight-based exercise; includes rest days as part of period, 1 = TRUE, 0 = FALSE

label: Weight Change
desc: change: resulting change in weight in oz, calculated from following day's observed weight
